author: Stereogum
title: Musician Shot Walking Home From A Giant Dog SXSW Show
text: Last year, SXSW ended with gunshots . This year, it's started with them. The Austin Chronicle reports that Michael Sanders, who plays lead guitar for indie rock quartet Löwin, was shot while walking home from A Giant Dog 's performance at Hotel Vegas on Friday night. According to Sanders, three masked men armed … More »
